item.description:
Meet me at Max & Dylan's to listen to live jazz. I'm not familiar with this band, so it'll be an adventure for all of us!

Check out their website for more info:

http://www.maxanddyla...

There will be no reservation and no group tab because people arrive and leave at various times. We'll either be sitting at the bar, or standing near the bar. Come and go as you please.

This event is also posted on the Boston Blues and Jazz Meetup.

I'll email my cell phone # that day to the people who respond yes and maybe.

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll email my cell phone # to the people who respond yes and maybe.
item.name: Max & Dylan's
